name: cronch
description:
Introduction
An entry for the casual two-week Celesta game jam, cronch is a simple game about chomping food that comes your way. If you're lucky you'll get a time dilator powerup (max 3) which will be stored for use at anytime you like. Get hit by food and lose health (max 3), lose all health and it's Game Over.

Controls:
Cursor / WASD : "attack"
Space: activate time dilator (if you have one)

Misc
All assets are customizable via data/theme.txt

Source code: https://github.com/karnkaul/cronch

Collaboration is welcome: eg providing audio assets.
